name: Chloe & Conflict
description:
Both sides of Chloe's personality must be saved! Solve puzzles to untangle the conflict in Chloe's mind, and discover her story.

Chloe is just an ordinary person and like many of us, she has struggles with her mental health and self-image. Follow Chloe on an adventure into her own mind, while she struggles between a personality conflict. Are her issues going to be resolved? Will she be able to discover her true self and rid her mind from societal norms and expectations?
_________________________________________________________________

Installation:

Unzip the game and play

Instructions:

Guide each Chloe to her destination!

Space: Move

HOLD R: Restart

Control:  Show Arrows

Escape: Exit

If you get stuck you can use Ctrl+right Arrow, or Ctrl+Left Arrow to navigate levels!
